main event: A civilian pilot observed two unidentified objects in Boston, Massachusetts on 4 August 1947.
interesting points: The objects were described as elliptical and deep gold in color, measuring approximately 15 ft long and 2-3 ft in depth., They were traveling at an estimated speed of 350 MPH., The observation lasted for 30 seconds., The sighting was detailed enough to suggest that the objects had a definite shape, with no sign of gaseous dissipation., The report suggests that the objects might have been distorted reflections of the sun.
